text: James Crawford (born 1877) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:Year of death unknown Category:People from Leith Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Abercorn F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: James Crawford (footballer, born 1877)
